meta.title: Lunar New Year 2026 | Year of the Horse | Fayetteville NC
meta.description: Celebrate Lunar New Year 2026 in Fayetteville, NC! Join our diverse Asian community for traditional games, food, cultural dress-up, and welcoming the Year of the Fire Horse on February 17.

hero.title: Lunar New Year
hero.subtitle: Year of the Fire Horse
hero.description: Join Fayetteville's diverse Asian community in celebrating the Lunar New Year! Experience traditional games, authentic cuisine, and cultural festivities.

community.title: A Celebration for Everyone
community.description1: Fayetteville is home to a vibrant and growing Asian community - Chinese, Korean, Vietnamese, Japanese, Thai, Indonesian, Filipino, and many more cultures call our city home. The Lunar New Year is a time to come together, share traditions, and celebrate the rich tapestry of Asian heritage right here in our community.
community.description2: Whether you're celebrating your own heritage or discovering new cultures, we invite you to join us in welcoming the Year of the Horse!

zodiac.title: Year of the Fire Horse
zodiac.description: 2026 marks the Year of the Fire Horse - the first since 1966! People born in Horse years are known for their energy and free spirit.

luckyColors.title: Horse Year Lucky Colors
luckyColors.subtitle: For those born in Horse years

luckyNumbers.title: Horse Year Lucky Numbers
luckyNumbers.subtitle: For those born in Horse years

games.title: Traditional Games & Challenges
games.description: Learn and play traditional games from across Asia! No experience needed - we'll teach you everything.

mahjong.name: Mahjong
mahjong.description: A tile-based game of skill, strategy, and calculation. Learn to match tiles and build winning hands.

yutNori.name: Yut Nori
yutNori.description: A traditional board game using wooden sticks. Race your pieces around the board to win!

go.name: Go (Baduk/Weiqi)
go.description: An ancient strategy game of territorial control. Simple rules, infinite depth.

chineseChess.name: Chinese Chess (Xiangqi)
chineseChess.description: A strategic board game with unique pieces like cannons and elephants.

bigTwo.name: Big Two (Dai Di)
bigTwo.description: A fast-paced card game where you race to empty your hand with card combinations.

cauCa.name: Cau Ca
cauCa.description: Traditional fishing card game played during Tet celebrations.

food.title: Traditional Food & Drinks
food.description: Taste the flavors of the Lunar New Year! Each dish carries special meaning and wishes for the year ahead.

jiaozi.name: Jiaozi (Dumplings)
jiaozi.description: Crescent-shaped dumplings symbolizing wealth and prosperity. A must-have for Chinese New Year!
jiaozi.symbolism: Wealth & fortune (shaped like ancient gold ingots)

tteokguk.name: Tteokguk
tteokguk.description: Rice cake soup traditionally eaten on New Year's Day. Eating it means gaining a year of age!

banhChung.name: Banh Chung
banhChung.description: Square sticky rice cake wrapped in banana leaves, filled with pork and mung beans.

springRolls.name: Spring Rolls
springRolls.description: Crispy golden rolls filled with vegetables and meat, representing gold bars.

mochi.name: Mochi
mochi.description: Soft rice cakes in various flavors, traditionally eaten during New Year celebrations.

nianGao.name: Nian Gao
nianGao.description: Sweet sticky rice cake. The name sounds like "higher year" - wishes for improvement.

sujeonggwa.name: Sujeonggwa
sujeonggwa.description: Sweet cinnamon and ginger punch with dried persimmons. Refreshing and aromatic.

jasmineTea.name: Jasmine Tea
jasmineTea.description: Fragrant green tea scented with jasmine blossoms. A symbol of elegance and purity.

bobaTea.name: Boba Tea
bobaTea.description: Beloved milk tea with chewy tapioca pearls. A modern classic!

sake.name: Sake
sake.description: Traditional rice wine often enjoyed during celebrations and ceremonies.

traDa.name: Tra Da (Iced Tea)
traDa.description: Simple, refreshing iced green tea served throughout Vietnam.

attire.title: Traditional Attire & Dress-Up
attire.description: Experience the beauty of traditional Asian clothing! Try on beautiful garments and learn about their cultural significance.

hanbok.name: Hanbok
hanbok.description: Elegant traditional Korean dress with vibrant colors and graceful lines

qipao.name: Qipao/Cheongsam
qipao.description: Form-fitting dress with high collar, often in red with gold accents

aoDai.name: Ao Dai
aoDai.description: Long tunic worn over trousers, known for its flowing elegance

kimono.name: Kimono
kimono.description: Traditional wrapped garment with beautiful patterns and obi belt

businesses.title: Support Local Asian Businesses
businesses.description: Fayetteville has amazing Asian restaurants and shops. Visit them to experience authentic flavors year-round!

participate.title: Share Your Culture
participate.description: We're looking for community members to help make Fayetteville's Lunar New Year celebration special!

items.teachGame: Teach a traditional game or craft
items.shareRecipe: Share a family recipe or food tradition
items.specialPromo: Offer special Lunar New Year promotions

learnMore.title: Learn More About Lunar New Year

koreaNet.title: Korea.net
koreaNet.description: Korean perspectives on Seollal traditions and zodiac

nipponCom.title: Nippon.com
nipponCom.description: Year of the Horse 2026 - Japanese zodiac traditions

fireHorse.title: Fire Horse 2026
fireHorse.description: Why this rare year could bring change and progress

smithsonian.title: Smithsonian
smithsonian.description: Cultural history of the Horse in Asian traditions

footer.initiative: This page is part of a community initiative to bring Lunar New Year celebrations to Fayetteville, NC. Event details are being planned - check back for updates!
